column5: Guys, I have heard that the inner bay on Lake Erie has sand bars that can present a danger to the newbie. What is the best way to learn the bay without risking the boat? Thanks, Jim
GPS/Chartplotter with a hydrographic map would be a benefit...Erie is big water..  G
Get a chart! I've seen way too many people hit the sandbars and nearly get killed!

Hi Radnine.  That sandbar can be a real pain.  Also, depending on water levels it can't always be visible.  It you are launching from the old cut, stop in and see Ronnie at Rotten Ronnie's bait and tackle.  He will be able to walk you around it.  Cheers  Craig
